name: uartconsole
text: %1 a login console over the GPIO serial
shortDescription: Enable or disable a login console over the GPIO UART RX/TX pins
longDescription: The Raspberry Pi GPIO has a pin labelled RX and another labeled TX. Together they make up a serial connection you can use to communicate with other serial devices. By default, these pins are set to display a login console over the serial connectionm but if you want to use them with another serial device, you'll want to disable this.
